heading: mrs. candidate?
subheading: elizabeth dole is stepping aside as head of the american red cross, and political supporters hope she'll campaign for the republican presidential nomination. leaders of the "draft elizabeth 2000" campaign say the wife of 1996 gop nominee bob dole would also be a strong vice presidential candidate.
author: wired staff
